samplePrompts.text: Show me the details for my next meeting.
Provide the agenda and key points for my upcoming meeting.
What topics are on the agenda for the next meeting?

commands.semanticDescription: An extension to fetch and provide summaries, agendas, or key details of upcoming meetings by their subjects or keywords.
commands.title: Meeting Details - Decisions™

longDescription:
Make your meetings count with a game-changing solution that powers meeting collaboration, engagement and productivity for users of Microsoft Teams with an agenda builder, minutes template, time tracker, secure voting, task assignment and more.
Thousands of customers trust Decisions for their meetings, whether they are held virtually, in-person or a hybrid of the two. 

**Key Features**

- Teams meeting side panel support (In-meeting experience)
- Smart Agenda builder
- Collaboration on Agenda
- One-click meeting minutes for Word and OneNote
- Automatic creation of Meeting Book PDF or PPT
- Custom templates
- Time tracker
- Easily manage guest and external presenters
- Agenda topic submission process
- Secure voting
- Tasks and decisions syncing to Microsoft Planner and ToDo
- Meeting Engagement Score
- Meeting Feedback
- Works with Microsoft 365 Copilot (Ex: Share meeting details)

For more information on getting started with Decisions, please [click here](https://support.meetingdecisions.com/en/getting-started)

If you see objectionable content, please [let us know](mailto:support@meetingdecisions.com?subject=Report%20of%20Objectionable%20Content)
shortDescription: ✨ AI-powered meetings: Agendas, summaries, decisions + tasks, all in one place

samplePrompts.text: Welche Themen stehen auf der Agenda für das nächste Meeting?
Stellen Sie die Agenda und die wichtigsten Punkte für mein bevorstehendes Meeting bereit.
Welche Themen stehen auf der Agenda für das nächste Meeting?

commands.semanticDescription: An extension to fetch and provide summaries, agendas, or key details of upcoming meetings by their subjects or keywords.
commands.title: Besprechungsbriefing

localizedDefinitions.longDescription:
Verbessern Sie Produktivität, Engagement und Zusammenarbeit Ihrer Meetings mit einer bahnbrechenden Lösung für Microsoft Teams mit einem Agenda-Editor, Protokollvorlagen, Zeitmanagement, Sicheren Abstimmungen, Aufgabenzuweisungen und vielem mehr. 
 
Tausende Kunden vertrauen Decisions – unabhängig ob Meetings persönlich, online, oder kombiniert durchgeführt werden. 
 
**Schlüsselfunktionen** 
- Teams-Meeting Support in Seitenleiste („In-Meeting Experience“) 
- Intelligenter Agenda-Editor 
- Zusammenarbeit an Tagesordnungspunkten 
- Ein-Klick-Sitzungsprotokoll in Word oder OneNote 
- Automatische Erstellung von Sitzungsbüchern als PDF or PPT 
- Benutzerdefinierte Sitzungsvorlagen 
- Zeitmanagement (Stoppuhr) 
- Management von Gastteilnehmern / Externen Moderatoren 
- Einreichungsprozess für Tagesordnungspunkte 
- Sichere Abstimmungen 
- Beschlüsse- und Aufgabensynchronisierung mit Microsoft Planner und „To Do“

commands.semanticDescription: An extension to fetch and provide summaries, agendas, or key details of upcoming meetings by their subjects or keywords.
commands.title: Møtebrief

localizedDefinitions.longDescription:
Få mer produktive møter med Decisions. Samarbeid om møteagendaen, skriv smarte møtereferater og følge opp aksjonspunkter og beslutninger på en enkel måte.
Tusener av kunder bruker Decisions for sine møter, enten de holdes virtuelt, fysisk eller er en hybrid.  

**Nøkkelfunksjonalitet**

- Sidepanel med agenda i Teamsmøter
- Smart agendadesigner
- Agendasamhandling
- Ett-klikks møtereferat for Word og OneNote
- Generer møtebok i PDF eller PPT
- Maler for agenda og referater
- Tidtager per sak i møtet
- Administrere gjestedeltagere
- Send inn saker til møteagenda
- Sikker votering
- Oppgaver og beslutningslogg som synces til Planner og ToDo
- Meeting Engagement Score
- Møtefeedback
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: Lag smarte møteagendaer og referater - Få mer ut av dine møter
